```{r}
shape <- 2
rate <- .01
# shape <- 100
# rate <- 1
x <- seq(.01,1000,.01)
y <- dgamma(x, shape = shape, rate = rate)
plot(x,y)
shape/rate
shape/rate^2
```



```{r}
rgamma(n=5,shape = shape, rate = rate)
```




```{r}
a <- 1
b <- 1
x <- seq(.01,1,.01)
y <- dbeta(x, a,b)
plot(x,y)
```
